title: Generate tsconfig.{targetName}.json file
description: Generate a TypeScript configuration file with the specified target name

targetName.description: The basename for the tsconfig file (e.g., 'tools' for tsconfig.tools.json).
targetName.x-prompt: What should be the target name for the tsconfig file?

skipConfig.description: Skip adding the tsconfig.{targetName}.json to the project root.
